Script.label: electrical power up with a p u
Script.script: (SPEAK:powering up the aircraft with a p u) (SLEEP:2500) 20 (>L:goal) (SLEEP:500) 1 (>K:KPCrew B737-MSFS_PMDG_SET_DC_METER) (SLEEP:1000) 1 (>L:goal) (SLEEP:500) 1 (>K:KPCrew B737-MSFS_PMDG_SET_BATT_POWER) (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_11_73X, number) 0 != if{ 1101 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_74_73X, number) 0 != if{ 7401 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_167_73X, number) 0 != if{ 16701 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:500) (L:switch_168_73X, number) 0 != if{ 16801 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_36_73X, number) 0 != if{ 3601 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:500) (L:switch_109_73X, number) 0 != if{ 10901 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_36_73X, number) 60 < if{ 1 (>K:GEAR_DOWN) } (SLEEP:500) 1 (>K:THROTTLE_90) (SLEEP:1000) 1 (>K:THROTTLE_CUT) (SLEEP:1000) 69602 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:6000) 71501 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:6000) 71502 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:6000) 11801 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:500) 11801 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:60000) 2801 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:1000) 2901 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:2000) 76902 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:3000) 76902 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) (SLEEP:1000) (SPEAK:electrical power up completed)

Script.label: electrical power up with g p u
Script.script: (SPEAK:powering up the aircraft with g p u) (SLEEP:2500) 20 (>L:goal) (SLEEP:500) 1 (>K:KPCrew B737-MSFS_PMDG_SET_DC_METER) (SLEEP:1000) 1 (>L:goal) (SLEEP:500) 1 (>K:KPCrew B737-MSFS_PMDG_SET_BATT_POWER) (SLEEP:1000) (SPEAK:please connect the G P U via ground services) (SLEEP:15000) (L:switch_11_73X, number) 0 != if{ 1101 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_74_73X, number) 0 != if{ 7401 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_167_73X, number) 0 != if{ 16701 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:500) (L:switch_168_73X, number) 0 != if{ 16801 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_36_73X, number) 0 != if{ 3601 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:500) (L:switch_109_73X, number) 0 != if{ 10901 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (SLEEP:1000) (L:switch_36_73X, number) 60 < if{ 1 (>K:GEAR_DOWN) } (SLEEP:500) 1 (>K:THROTTLE_90) (SLEEP:1000) 1 (>K:THROTTLE_CUT) (SLEEP:1000) 1701 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE|10) (SLEEP:1000) (SPEAK:electrical power up completed)

Script.label: MSFS_PMDG_SET_BATT_POWER
Script.script: @goal 0 == if{ (L:switch_02_73X, number) 0 == if{ 201 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } (L:switch_01_73X, number) 0 != if{ 101 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } } els{ (L:switch_02_73X, number) 0 != if{ 201 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } }

Script.label: MSFS_PMDG_SET_DC_METER
Script.script: 0 (>L:repeat) @goal (L:switch_03_73X, number) > if{@goal (L:switch_03_73X, number) - 10 / (>L:repeat) 302 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE|@repeat)} @goal (L:switch_03_73X, number) < if{(L:switch_03_73X, number) @goal - 10 / (>L:repeat) 301 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE|@repeat)}
